title.zh: 南昌：江西省妇幼保健院检测活动
title.en: Nanchang: Jiangxi Provincial Maternal and Child Health Hospital Testing Activity

description.zh: 南昌市血之友公益协会携手江西省妇幼保健院生殖医院，延续「携带者检测援助」项目，帮助14名女性得到了凝血检测。这次与省级妇幼保健院的合作，进一步提升了检测服务的专业水平，为有生育需求的血友病女性携带者提供了更加专业和便利的检测服务，体现了项目在医疗资源整合方面的不断进步。
description.en: Nanchang Hemophilia Association partnered with Jiangxi Provincial Maternal and Child Health Hospital Reproductive Hospital, continuing the 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project and helping 14 women receive coagulation testing. This collaboration with the provincial maternal and child health hospital further enhanced the professional level of testing services, providing more professional and convenient testing services for female hemophilia carriers with reproductive needs, reflecting the project's continuous progress in medical resource integration.

title.zh: 江西省妇幼保健院检测活动
title.en: Jiangxi Provincial MCH Hospital Testing Activity

description.zh: 江西省妇幼保健院生殖医院检测活动现场，14名女性接受专业检测服务
description.en: Scene from Jiangxi Provincial MCH Hospital Reproductive Hospital testing activity, with 14 women receiving professional testing services

title.zh: 微信公众号：省妇幼检测活动报道
title.en: WeChat: Provincial MCH Testing Activity Report
